segments.text: Excuse me . Do you study Chinese at the university here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . But my characters are very bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It takes a long time to learn Chinese writing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you Chinese ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am . I am from Taiwan . I came here to study political science .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like it so far . But my English still needs work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to study Mandarin and international relations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does the Chinese department here teach regular characters or simplified characters ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They teach regular characters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I'm from Taiwan , so I know regular characters better than simplified .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You just said your English needs work , yes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's true . Especially my writing . I think my papers aren't good enough . I make too many grammatical mistakes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am very serious about learning Chinese.But for me the hard part now is pronunciation.You have the four tones in Chinese . It is very hard . Maybe , if you have time , maybe we could do a language exchange .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean you and I ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , why not ? I mean , if you come to this cafe often , maybe we could meet here and practice Chinese and English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea . How often would you like to do it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's see ... My schedule right now is quite busy.But I think I could spend 90 minutes a week in language exchange .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would we manage it though ? How would we spend the 90 minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , we could spend 45 minutes working on your English writing.If you want , I could help you edit your papers.Or we could do English conversation . Whatever you want.And then the next 45 minutes you would help me with my Chinese .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would I help you with writing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . For me right now , the important thing is spoken Chinese . I need practice . So you could tutor me in speaking.We could use my textbook , and you could ask me questions.Then you could correct my mistakes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it sounds like a good system . But when is it convenient to meet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , today is Monday.Actually , for me Monday at this time would be the best . I am free from now until 11
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . In fact , I'm free until 1
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So if you want to meet at 10
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds good . I will bring the papers I'm working on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I will bring my textbook and a tape recorder . I would like to record some things so I can practice on my own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me give you my phone number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I'll give you mine too . Then we can call if we have to cancel for some reason .
segments.speaker: S2
